summary: A reupload of RACISM, but with fixes.
descriptionHtml:
Version 1.1: Yes, I updated already, sorry, I just noticed there was an edit that did nothing so I removed it. That's it.

This is the same as [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52071/?]RACISM - Racial Adjustments Concerning Imbalanced Skyrim Mechanics[/url] (by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/8618046/?]LazyDreamer[/url]) but with bug/typo fixes which includes making the same changes as the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71214/?]Unofficial Skyrim Legendary Edition Patch[/url].
There might still be bugs, but none as far as I know.

To make it clear, this is simply a replacement for the old mod and you don't need anything from it.
author: ut110
